attributes.action: bad conditions and frequency of buses
attributes.additional_details: we are creating a campaign at school on the frequencey and conditions of buses please support us and sign thanks

rejection.details: You petition does not set out what action you wish the national Government to take, nor whether your campaign is aimed only at Bournemouth or nationwide.  You might like to think about resubmitting your petition so that it calls on the Government to change the law in some specific way, or to provide funds for some specific improvement.  If your concern is local, you may want to approach Bournemouth Borough Council (the e-petitions site is designed for gathering support for issues which are the responsibility of national government).
